item.title: Waste Water Drain Heater System(s) – Secured Off

numlitem.para: Water supply to associated lavatory, galley and service center basin(s) is secured off, and
Associated lavatory, galley and service center basin(s) is not used.

note.para: Lavatory basin is not available. All other functions of lavatory are available.

placard.para: Placard on service basin: "DO NOT USE – DRAIN MAST HEATER INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To secure the associated basin shutoff valve(s) closed:
Open access panel at all lavatory sinks, galley sinks, and drinking fountains which drain into inoperative drain mast.
Close water supply shutoff valve at each location.
